section.heading: Establishment of the Commission on Human Rights.
section.text: There is hereby established, in the Executive Branch of the District government, a Commission on Human Rights.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: Dec. 13, 1977, D.C. Law 2-38, title IV, ยง 401
as added Dec. 7, 2004, D.C. Law 15-216, ยง 2(b), 51 DCR 9123

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 1-523.01.
